titles.title: A bill for the relief of D.W. Jacobson, Ronald Karkala, and Paul Bjorgen of Grand Rapids, Minnesota.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12218)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Star Print ordered on the bill.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 8/19/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a certain sum to specified individuals for damages incurred relating to the termination of a contract with the U.S. Postal Service for the manufacture of wooden pallets.
